name: JEAN CHARLES MAURICE
description: JC is initially a defense engineer and worked in war industry for years before creating his own trading company 10 years ago. His wide experience makes him always at the vangard, a sharp and precious investment adviser!

name: PRAVINKUMAR CHAUNDHARY
description: pravinkumar is a successful business man who has a vast experience in the insurance industry and is also a life time Chairman member of LIC.
